text: Dame Cécile Ellen Fleurette La Grenade, GCMG, OBE, PhD (born 30 December 1952) is a Grenadian food scientist and politician. She became Governor-General of Grenada in May 2013. La Grenade was sworn-in as Governor-General of Grenada on 7 May 2013 as the nation's first female Governor-General. ==References== ==Other websites== *Grenada Names First Female Governor General, Cecile La Grenade *Convention on the Elimination of All Forms of Discrimination against Women Category:1952 births Category:Living people Category:Governors-General of Grenada Category:Current national leaders Category:University of the West Indies alumni
title: Cécile La Grenade
